column4: hi. i don't remember which is the page for configuring printers... can you write the link? thnks
I don't need explanations on how to install printers
I don't understand what you mean by the "page" for configuring printers and a "link" to it. printers in ubuntu are configured with an application. nobody can give you a link to that
somebody did. and it worked perfectly.
what makes you think that you can configure your printers through a local web interface?
if you don't know or don't understand what I'm talking about, it's unuseful to make observations
well you haven't what makes you think you can configure your printer through a web interface. why would you be able to do that?
i HAVE IT. i don't remember the url.
oh look. a search for "cups web interface" reveals that as the first result
now, you are ridiculous. You don't want to admit  your ignorance about the question
I never knew that cups has a web interface. why would it?
but, I still maintain that your question was crap
